db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 6.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This helper implements an infinite grid in the horizontal plane. The grid fades out as the grid lines converge or at the far clip distance, whichever comes first.
The grid needs to be a child of the SceneEnvironment.

db:section.db:title: gridAxes : bool
db:section.db:para: This property determines whether the X and Y axes are marked. If true, the X-axis will be red and the Y-axis green. The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: gridInterval : float
db:section.db:para: This property defines the distance between grid lines. The default value is 1.0.

db:section.db:title: visible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property determines whether the grid is shown. The default value is true.
